Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

I just tested this in the Quest 5.8 desktop player:

Press F9 to open the HTML tools.

Switch to the Console tab.

Paste this and press enter: `$("#cmdExitFullScreen").click()`
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

I just tested this in the Quest 5.8 desktop player:

Press F9 to open the HTML tools.

Switch to the Console tab.

Paste this and press enter: $("#cmdExitFullScreen").click()
